name: Fantasy Escape
description:
Welcome to Fantasy Escape!

Get ready to escape from your dreams!

After falling asleep you'll find yourself in the middle of your dreams - trapped. Use your imagination to escape all those rooms your brain is generating for you by solving different surreal tricks, riddles and puzzles. If you think your room escape skills are good enough just download this adventure game and let your dreams trap you.

Are you ready for the most uncommon room escape game you have every played?

Game features:
Mystical atmosphere
Magnificent puzzles
Stunning story
Escape your fantasy!
